statues_named_john project

Source: prompt.md

This is the system prompt for this project

Build an R package that sources the data at https://www.londonremembers.com/ Support all the endpoints. Add documentation and tests and make sure it passes check.

Add a vigette to the project compare and contrast memorials honouring + men named john v women of any name v dogs (male or female) + memorials can include statues or other specific markers + Vignette tables and plots should include + type of memorial e.g. statue v plaque + year and decade it was erected + location information + any other factor that might partition that data

Developed by Your Name.
